Bash(gh release create v1.0.0 --title "v1.0.0 - Initial Release" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Features

- **MP3 & MP4 Downloads** - Download YouTube videos as high-quality 320kbps MP3 or MP4 video
- **Channel Scraping** - Scrape entire YouTube channels using Data API v3 \(unlimited videos\)
- **Content Filtering** - Filter by type \(videos/shorts/all\) and time frame \(week/month/year/all\)
- **Shorts Detection** - Accurate YouTube Shorts detection via `/shorts/` URL verification
- **Duplicate Detection** - Smart detection for both MP3 and MP4 formats
- **Real-time Progress** - Live progress tracking in the web UI
- **Docker Support** - One-command deployment with `docker compose up`
- **API Fallback** - Works without API key using yt-dlp \(limited to ~360 videos\)

## Tech Stack

| Component | Technology |
|-----------|------------|
| Backend | FastAPI, yt-dlp, Python 3.11+ |
| Frontend | React 18, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS |
| Testing | 72+ unit tests with pytest |

## Quick Start

```bash
git clone https://github.com/tomyanzhiyuan/ytmp3-scraper.git
cd ytmp3-scraper
docker compose up --build
# Open http://localhost:8000
```

## Full Changelog

See [README.md]\(https://github.com/tomyanzhiyuan/ytmp3-scraper#readme\) for complete documentation.
EOF
